nodes.text: Thoxo was a male Corellian thief. At some point during the early career of the Trandoshan bounty hunter Cradossk, a bounty was placed on Thoxo and the Corellian went into hiding on the planet Yitabo, where he disguised himself as a retired academic from Thyferra. However, Cradossk subsequently tracked down and killed him to claim the bounty.
